questions.sparqlQuery:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
ASK
WHERE 
{
        res:Barack_Obama onto:spouse ?spouse .
        ?spouse rdfs:label ?name .
        FILTER(regex(?name,'Michelle')) 
}

languageToQuestion.en: Is the wife of President Obama called Michelle?

questions.sparqlQuery:
PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpedia2: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
SELECT ?uri ?string
WHERE 
{
	 ?uri rdf:type yago:WikicatStatesOfTheUnitedStates  .
        ?uri dbpedia2:densityrank ?density
        OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') }
} ORDER BY ASC(?density) LIMIT 1

languageToQuestion.en: Which state of the United States of America has the highest density?

questions.sparqlQuery:
PREFIX  rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX  rdf:  <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX  foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX  onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>

SELECT DISTINCT  ?uri
WHERE
  { ?film    rdf:type       onto:TelevisionShow ;
             rdfs:label     "Charmed"@en ;
             onto:starring  ?actors .
    ?actors  foaf:homepage  ?uri
  }

languageToQuestion.en: Give me the official websites of actors of the television show Charmed.

questions.sparqlQuery:
PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
SELECT ?number
WHERE 
{
	res:IBM onto:revenue ?number .
}

languageToQuestion.en: What is the revenue of IBM?

questions.sparqlQuery:
PREFIX dbpedia2: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
SELECT DISTINCT ?string
WHERE 
{
	res:Frank_Herbert dbpedia2:occupation ?string .
}

languageToQuestion.en: What is the profession of Frank Herbert?
